USE gold_db
GO 

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateViewGold @ViewName nvarchar(100)
AS 
BEGIN 

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
    SELECT *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
        BULK "https://deprojectdatalake2.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/"' + @ViewName + '/,
        FORMAT = "DELTA"
    ) AS [result]'
EXEC (@statement)

END 
GO
